snippet: The United Nations General Assembly is expected to vote Tuesday on the Arms Trade Treaty, the first global attempt to regulate the $70 billion in annual sales of conventional weapons.
abstract: United Nations General Assembly is expected to vote on the Arms Trade Treaty, first global attempt to regulate $70 billion in annual sales of conventional weapons.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations General Assembly is expected to vote Tuesday on the Arms Trade Treaty, the first global attempt to regulate the $70 billion in annual sales of conventional weapons.

headline.seo: Vote Expected on Arms Sales Treaty
